website_summaries.verdict: Thick galvanized steel tetherball pole will give you many hours of play time.
pros: Uses a 2.375-inch diameter pole, ensuring high-quality performance
Pole placed 24 inches into the ground for maximum stability
Rubber-covered regulation-size ball performs well in a busy play area
cons: Price for this set is higher than others

customer_reviews.title: Tetherball makes the grandkids want to go outside and play
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy high-quality pole. my handyman put it in a tire set in concrete. he did cut about 2 feet off the bottom of the pole to make the height 10 feet. It is a lot of fun whenever we have people over and the tire allows us to roll it off to the side of the yard when necessary. I replaced the Voit ball with a very soft tachikara ball and use a butchers knot to tie the ball to the rope.
customer_reviews.author: Catalina Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Pole is great , ball sucks.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this tether ball set up for about 3 weeks now. The pole is really strong and easy to set up. The ball that came with it wasn't great. The ball would get flat every 2 days and the rope broke after about the 2nd week of having it. I just bought another ball. Either way the kids love it. Just disappointed that we had to order something else and wait for it i guess.
customer_reviews.author: Richard O.

customer_reviews.title: You just can't get family fun for this low price!
customer_reviews.text: This tetherball set is great! It comes with everything but the concerts. We were so excited to get playing, we did as we read other reviewers had done and put it a 5 gallon bucket full of rocks. It worked ok. The carabiner that holds the rope is kind of dangerous, as it does fly off sometimes. You just can't get family fun for this low price. We look forward to lots more memories of playing tetherball together.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy Chicken Lady

customer_reviews.title: High quality tetherball set!
customer_reviews.text: Though on the expensive side you won't be disappointed with this tetherball set. Heavy gauge metal pole is not something you would find at Lowes for DIY. You set the pole 2' in the ground with single bag of concrete, I could literally climb the pole and it will not move. I had to deflate the ball a little to soften the hits to the hands, might be best to use gloves. Definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Jim & Christy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and rock solid
customer_reviews.text: Super high quality and heavy duty pole. I used a brake drum from a semi-trailer which already weighs about 70 lb and filled it full of concrete and put this pole in it. That way it's slightly portable. It worked great and this pole is rock solid. My grandkids and all their friends have been playing on this thing constantly since I built this setup in mid December. This is going to last a very very long time. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: T. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy duty!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our granddaughter. She is only 9 years old. It is a very well made product. The pole is heavy duty and will last a lifetime! The ball that comes with it is great. We also bought a softer one for now. Grandpa dug a hole and did put cement in since it will stay in tha spot....a long time!
customer_reviews.author: pam stapleton

customer_reviews.title: Built like a tank, will last forever....
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grand children, and they are loving it...Built like a tank, will last until they have grand children.......
customer_reviews.author: Healthy 1

customer_reviews.title: Made us kids again!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome pole... our grandson has fun with it but we’re a competitive family so MANY teatherball tournaments have been held. We cemented it right in the yard.. I see that a lot of people put it in a tire to make it portable but I didn’t see the point since it’s a steel pole and you can take off the rope and ball for winter. If you have little ones, you may want to invest in a softer ball.. the one included is pretty hard.
customer_reviews.author: W. Darr

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy!!
customer_reviews.text: This pole is so sturdy. It's like something you would see in a school yard. I wasn't expecting it to be so good. This is going to last forever. We have cemented it and used it at our July 4th party. Everyone loved it, it got a lot of play
customer_reviews.author: Lacy

customer_reviews.title: Must Cement In Ground
customer_reviews.text: If you don't plan on cementing, it wont work. The pole is hollow, but is big around. Very well made. Tried without cementing, but not stable without it. I DO recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: WiseOldOwl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the backyard.
customer_reviews.text: We put this in our backyard for the kids to play during quarantine & they have got sooo much use out of it. My husband brilliantly thought to buy a larger pipe to cement into the ground so that we can easily remove the pole when it’s not in use. Then he bought hard plastic pipe cover to cover the hole & allow for easy, uninterrupted lawn mowing!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Solid and Made to a Last
customer_reviews.text: This really does feel like equipment you'd expect at a school yard or playground. Very sturdy and will withstand any abuse the kids can throw at it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Strope

customer_reviews.title: Don't leave outside in the sun, very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Didn't come with hook to hook rope to pole. Within a week ball flat, then a month ball all sun bleached, 2 months rope broke
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: The one to buy if you want it to last.
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly solid. There is a little movement at the joint, but the pole itself is very close to “playground quality”. Not like the cheap set my family when I was a kid. Used a post digger and one bag of quick-crete to install.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great value, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Sturdy pole, the kids and adults have loved it. We've had it for 2 months now, the rope did break, but I was able to fix that. We pounded the pole about a foot and a half in the ground with a sledgehammer, put a tire around the bottom and filled it with big heavy rocks. It moves a little, but not enough to really notice. We didn't want to use concrete so we could move it if we needed to.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a nice sturdy pole. This is it. Good quality materials. Perfect for backyard fun.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan S

customer_reviews.title: Will last for years
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for one of grandkids. Very sturdy, well designed. We bought another for the other grand kid. Installed in a old tire with cement. Easy to move around.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Schoenthaler

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a Xmas gift and we recently cemented in place. We play HARD on this thing and it is holding up awesomely! My only concern is how hard the ball is since we might be a little too competitive while playing, but it’s softened up a lot over the past month. I would definitely recommend this to others!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Sun damage ball
customer_reviews.text: This is a good set but has not even been one full season and ball has completely faded from sun damage. It seems to be working ok.
customer_reviews.author: Casia

customer_reviews.title: Nice quarantine game
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality set. Easy to assemble and install. Comes w tether ball.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Hazel

customer_reviews.title: Bought. For church playground.
customer_reviews.text: We mounted the pole inside a tire filled with cement. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Cat W

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and solid
customer_reviews.text: Always loved teatherball as a kid. We used to destroy the kits. This one is awesome. Sturdy. Not flimsy at all. Trust me. Don’t skimp. Buy this one
customer_reviews.author: Brent Natzle

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product. Worthy of school yard equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Bibby T.

customer_reviews.title: Two shipping carton's...
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality item. Received fast and you receive two boxes.. two piece pole and hardware and another box with ball and rope. Looks like a very high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: edwardo2

customer_reviews.title: This isn’t going anywhere!
customer_reviews.text: This is so sturdy - worth the money for how solid it is.
customer_reviews.author: Gwyn77

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty for sure! Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Just like the old school tetherball ball from grade school! A little bit of work putting in ground but it won't be going any where for a long time. Kids love it....beware your back yard will become the neighborhood play ground. :)
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Kids like it
customer_reviews.text: Rope shredded after a few uses and had to replace. Cemented pole and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Tetherball
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas present, and it turned out to be the best present ever. My 8 year old Grand Daughter plays on it every chance she gets, she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: D2126

customer_reviews.title: The kids have fun. The ball held up after a year but ...
customer_reviews.text: We use this at a campground. The kids have fun. The ball held up after a year but the rope needed replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my big kids and the grans....great simple pastime. Gets them outside, exercise, teaches eye, hand coordination.
customer_reviews.author: bsalty61

customer_reviews.title: Tetherball
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this tetherball pole an ball. The ball wont hold air. I had to go purchase another one. So If I were u just buy the pole...
customer_reviews.author: debbie

customer_reviews.title: Commercial quality, residential price
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. We've had hours of fun & its lasted through a tropical storm
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and stands up to play from 4 year old grand daughter, 40 year old son, and all in between!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: missing bolt and rope ripped within 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.text: The box came open and we didn't have time to go through it and install it for a while after we received it. Now that we did, we have found that the bolt that's supposed to hold the top and bottom parts of the pole together is missing. Also, the string was apparently 2 pieces of rope glued together. It fell apart within 5 minutes of the ball being tied on. I'd love to get a bolt and replacement for the rope - can anyone tell me how to go about that?
customer_reviews.author: noneyu

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This Tetherball Set has provided hours of fun and activity for our whole family. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: mt in ri

customer_reviews.title: Rope is bad
customer_reviews.text: Within 2 months the rope deterated and ball went flat if you touch the rope it fall apart never even played it sucks
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the Family
customer_reviews.text: sturdy and fun. My 12 year old daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: S. K. Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. My Granddaughters couldn't wait for it to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. My Granddaughters couldn't wait for it to be put up and now play constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This tetherball pole is very strong! Playground strong .glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super durable
customer_reviews.text: It is super durable and if installed correctly will last a long time! My family and I have already had some fun competitive games on it!
customer_reviews.author: Meagan K. Patton

customer_reviews.title: ... a hole filled with concrete and it made it pretty stable.
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year loves her tetherball my father made a hole filled with concrete and it made it pretty stable.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel De La Garza

customer_reviews.title: 11 Year Old Niece's Birthday Gift.
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift but my niece and her family think it is great!
customer_reviews.author: Parrot lady

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something that would last, I have no doubt this will.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: We're very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: Considering the cost, the quality exceeded our expectations. We're very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Susan S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift to the grandchildren and they love it. Heavy duty and fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Joan K.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great- kids love it- easy to install. The ball did come off the rope but we fixed it fine
customer_reviews.author: Tom Russell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is like old school, and it last for a very long time. My granddaughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Hinds

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Simple to install. Very sturdy for the teenagers that will be using it. Heavy duty ball as well. Great product. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn M. Zuk

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! we have it cemented in an old tire ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome ! we have it cemented in an old tire so we can roll it around the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Ross

customer_reviews.title: OK, but...
customer_reviews.text: First package arrived minus ball. Got it put up and ball was bleached white on top in less than a week.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie G Lofton

customer_reviews.title: Missing hardware
customer_reviews.text: It didn't come with any hardware and I had to have another whole set shipped out to obtain these. The eye bolt is attached to the top of the pole with a nut for the tether ball to attach to. I thought it said a permanent eye was on the top of the pole. This is not permanent in my opinion. It is heavy duty and easy to install when all the pieces are included.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndy Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great quality pole and fun for all ages
customer_reviews.text: Installed this with 50lbs of cement at the base going down the recommended depth. The kids play with it a lot and it really is great exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Gemelli

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It didn't come with any hardware and there were no instructions. Who do I contact to get this?
customer_reviews.author: mneesa

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, we love this game
customer_reviews.text: well built, sturdy, we love this game....must have for the kids
customer_reviews.author: FARTFACE

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but parts not available separately
customer_reviews.text: I loved the product and we played all the time but then an angry neighbor cut it down bcz he did not like the location. So I contacted the company to buy another bottom pole but I was told that this is not possible . This is a really sturdy unit and we are still hoping to resign and replace that bottom pole
customer_reviews.author: Banana

customer_reviews.title: Tetherball!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Tetherball!!!!! Our friends have this tetherball in their backyard and my children LOVED it. We ordered it and put it in our backyard. It is a HUGE hit!!! We do a lot of entertaining, and children flock to this thing. We also have a big swing set and in-ground pool, so it's a nice addition. I'm not sure about some of the other reviews that say this is not sturdy. I anchored in in Cement, 2 feet deep, as recommended. It is not going anywhere! I know it will provide years of fun for us!
customer_reviews.author: Maddies mommy

customer_reviews.title: Very Poor Product!
customer_reviews.text: Simple, this is a two piece pole, one bolt in the middle. After tightening bolt the top pole moves back and forth still. Now I need to find a way to modify this product. Stay away and find yourself a better product. This is a piece of garbage and i feel taken.
customer_reviews.author: A. Cerrone

customer_reviews.title: It come with no base,
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you know what you are buying. I bought this for my kids for Christmas and due to too many gifts we did not open until now. and I then realized that it has no base and does not come with one. I have no way to use this thing with out a base, and after three months you can not return. Also, no solution, I emailed the seller and they have not even bothered to respond to me. So beware.....
customer_reviews.author: D. Allen-Attar

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is playground quality. Very heavy pole. Ball is regulation I imagine and very hard. I ordered a softer ball. Much better.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa O

product_meta.title: BSN Outdoor Tetherball Pole
product_meta.description: 12'L (2 pieces 6'L) 2 3/8" galvanized steel post installs permanently into the ground 2' Permanent top eye and ball included .
feature_bullets: Galvanized steel construction provides the stability and durability needed to withstand outdoor use
Allows children to play tetherball on the playground and develop basic sportsmanship skills
Two-piece design combines to form one 12 ft. high pole
Post permanently installs 2 ft. into the ground for secure attachment and reduced risk of the pole tipping or falling
Top eye, rope and ball are included, making it easy to set the game up and start playing right away

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
